product_name: Fisher Space Pen Bullet Pen with Clip
long_description: This pen combines timeless styling with a pressurized ink cartridge that allows the pen to write nearly anywhere, on anything. Replaceable pressurized ink cartridge continuously feeds ink to the tungsten carbide ball, allowing pen to write at any angle--even upside down. Visco-elastic ink writes smoothly and dependably on most surfaces, even under water, over fingerprints, in freezing cold, extreme heat and in space! Stainless-steel, precision-machined socket prevents leaks and oozing, yet delivers uniform ink flow. Ink will not dry out for over 100 years. Includes a slide-on clip to attach bullet pen to pocket. Pen opens to 5.3 inches; measures just 3.7 inches when closed, fitting easily into a pack or purse. Black ink, medium point.
short_description: This pen combines timeless styling with a pressurized ink cartridge that allows the pen to write nearly anywhere, on anything.
